mapper.select: select board.id, u.username, title, board.createDate,count from board inner join user u where u.id = board.userId
select b.id,b.title,b.content,u.username,b.count from board b inner join user u on b.userId = u.id where b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title},content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
